document.full_text: the cuts in compensation and benefits of state employees that texas legislators are considering will affect their own compensation and benefits, too. but not, so far, in their retirement packages.
document.title: the texas tribune: no lawmaker immunity as some benefits are cut
lines_and_colors: the cuts in compensation and benefits of state employees that texas legislators are considering will affect their own compensation and benefits, too. but not, so far, in their retirement packages.
